title: HNP Are Recruiting!
body:
HnP eSports are recruiting! We're an OOL team performing in every tournament available to us! 
Requirements:
- Diamond+ or high plat players with potential! 
- Have a working mic
- Be able to train weekly
- Have teamspeak
Please fill this out in the comments If interested :)
We will contact you through the League of Legends client :)
